reviews.customers_say: Customers find the dress cute, comfortable, and flattering, with a nice fit. Moreover, they describe it as an amazing summer dress. However, the material quality receives mixed feedback, with some liking it while others find it cheap. Additionally, the color accuracy and fabric transparency also get mixed reviews - while some say it isn't see-through, others note the white is slightly translucent. items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very cute and fits perfectly!
items.body: I ordered a size large â€” Iâ€™m 5'2" and around 160â€“165 lbs, and I carry my weight pretty proportionally (with just a little extra in the tummy area). The fit is flattering and super comfortable. The only downside is that the fabric is see-through. I donâ€™t wear slips or shapewear, so this particular color wonâ€™t work for me. Iâ€™m returning it, but I plan to repurchase in a darker color because itâ€™s too cute to pass up! Iâ€™ll definitely leave another review once I receive the new one. ðŸ’• Read more

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect travel dress
items.body: Perfect vacation dress. The slits come up higher on the side than it appears in pictures, personally I think itâ€™s actually more flattering that way. So comfy and great for travel, I love it! I sized up for it to be a little more flowy, and not so form fitting but Iâ€™d say it absolutely fits true to size. I could have easily ordered my true to size if I wanted a more fitted look. Read more

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Cute-but not on my body type
items.body: Beautiful dress & color. Loved the slit on sides of dress. But on my body shape with a bit of a tummy, it made me look pregnant. Sad, but I'm returning. I purchased the royal blue in size large. 41 inch chest. I wanted it to look good because it is such a cute, unique design but just not for me. Chest fit ok - it was the waist that looked so bad on me. Material was ok / lightweight. Read more
items.author: B3

short_description:
Womens Dress Split is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

This piece transitions well from daytime plans to evening events with a quick change of shoes and a small bag or clutch.

If you are between sizes, choose based on how close you like the fit through the waist and hips, then adjust with your usual layering choices.

long_description:
Womens Dress Split is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: 5, 5.5, 6, 6.5, 7, 7.5, 8, 8.5, 9, 9.5, 10, 11.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Sky Blue, Floral Multicolor, Blue, Apricot, Hot Pink, Black, Pink, Purple, Pink and Black, Royal Blue, Light Purple, Pure Yellow, Turquoise, White Multicolor. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
